bibl.title: Some Uncatalogued Papyri of Theological and other Interest in the John Rylands Library.
bibl.note: 1 Psalm XIX. 7-8 LXX (= 20: 6-7). 3rd/5th cent. - 2. Prayer-amulet (?). 6th cent. - 3. Christian Dating Formula.
Kraft Robert A. and Antonia Tripolitis, Some Uncatalogued Papyri of Theological and other Interest in the John Rylands Library.
